feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [EU/CA][Veeam] - Veeam backup maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 12, 18:00 UTC  -  Feb 16, 14:00 UTC

Jan 31, 14:38 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 12/02/2024 18:00 UTC
End time : 16/02/2024 14:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an internal maintenance on veeam backup service.
Customers will be notified to register their veeam servers.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - R807L25/R807L26
entry.content:
Jan 25, 10:25 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/01/2024 07:17 UTC
End Time : 25/01/2024 08:30 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Root cause : Electrical issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 25, 09:02 UTC
Update - Update : Hosts in rack R807L26 are currently reachable.

Jan 25, 08:15 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jan 25, 08:13 UTC
Investigating - Start Time : 25/01/2024 07:17 UTC
User impact : Hosts in racks R807L25 - R807L26 are currently unreachable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX8
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [RBX2A/RBX2B][HostedPrivateCloud] - Network perturbation
entry.content:
Jan 22, 10:28 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/01/2024 00:00 UTC
End Time : 19/01/2024 16:30 UTC
Root cause : Software network equipment problem
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 19, 18:27 UTC
Monitoring - Our teams observed traffic loss twice for 10 minutes each during the maintenance.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation

Jan 19, 15:46 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams realized that network perturbations are still present. They need to implement another maintenance to solve definitively the issue: Maintenance link

Jan 19, 14:04 UTC
Monitoring - Our technical teams implemented a fix to solve the issue. Network perturbation isn't observed since 13:25 UTC.
Our teams are monitoring the situation.

Jan 19, 09:55 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 16/01/2024 00:00 UTC
Service impact : high latency/loss for some traffic going through the gateway
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue with the manufacturer. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
